p: In addition, 4-week-old female specific pathogen-free (SPF) BALB/c mice were purchased from Chengdu Dossy Experimental Animal Co., Ltd. (Chengdu, China) and housed under Biosafety Laboratory 2 (BSL-2) conditions. The mice were allowed to acclimate for 3 days prior to infection, and their clinical signs were monitored daily throughout the study.
